title: Unit 4 Scan Barcode and Rack Cracking Modul Production System
description: Designed a barcode scanning and rack tracking system as a final project for the Production System module, aimed at automating item identification and placement using microcontrollers and barcode readers, showcasing skills in embedded systems and industrial automation.

title: Automatic Clothes Drying System
description: Supervised by Mr. Dadi, I developed an Arduino-based smart clothes drying system that uses sensors and motorized mechanisms to automatically respond to weather conditions, demonstrating skills in embedded systems and automation.
